author: andschwa
body: This should resolve #791. Instead of checking if `Assembly.Load` returned null (it doesn't), check if it threw `FileNotFoundException`, which it will if it doesn't find the assembly. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/792)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Tested, allows loading libraries from modules just fine now.

title: Try Assembly.Load correctly
